message: Let's split it 4:1, fair and square!
Meet me in the middle, but with a slight bias towards me!
Alice, don't be shy, I'll give you the slight bias you want!
I'm taking control, Bob! You can't resist this offer!
Time to take control, Bob! You can't outbid me!
Last chance, Bob! Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'm taking the last stand!
This is my final offer, Bob! Take it or leave it, but don't say I didn't warn you!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice! I'm not giving in yet!
This is my absolute final offer, Bob. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
I'll take it all! Game over, Alice!
